entry.def: A follower of a particular person, group, or belief is someone who supports or admires this person, group, or belief.

example.tran: 祖鲁因卡塔运动的支持者
民主党最忠诚的追随者

means.word_mean: 1. an ordinary person who accepts the leadership of another
2. someone who travels behind or pursues another
